headline: Should Push to Monetize Real Estate Spur Six Flags Entertainment (FUN) Investors to Rethink the Value Narrative?
summary: On September 26, 2025, activist investor Land & Buildings Investment Management publicly urged Six Flags Entertainment to unlock value by spinning off or selling its extensive real estate holdings, including the possibility of creating a real estate investment trust or engaging interested buyers such as VICI Properties and private equity. This proposal comes after challenges related to Six Flags’ merger with Cedar Fair and reflects increasing investor pressure for major corporate...
